quest.Name: [!quests.quest.What's Eating the Watervine?.Name!]What's Eating the Watervine?
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.What's Eating the Watervine?.Accomplishment!]You solved the mystery of the chewed-up watervine and warned the villagers of Joppa of the Girsh.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.What's Eating the Watervine?.Hagiograph!]In the month of =month= of =year=, =name= walked below the chrome arches, beat back the throng of girshlings, and healed the wilting crops.
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.What's Eating the Watervine?.Gospel!]At the bloody Battle of Red Rock, =name= fought the combined girshling and baboon forces to liberate the villagers of Joppa. In =player.t's= honor they <spice.history.gospels.Celebration.LateSultanate.!random>.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.What's Eating the Watervine?.step.Travel to Red Rock.Name!]Travel to Red Rock
step.text: Journey two parasangs north of Joppa to Red Rock.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.What's Eating the Watervine?.step.Find the Vermin.Name!]Find the Vermin
step.text: Find the creatures that are eating Joppa's watervine.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.What's Eating the Watervine?.step.Get a Corpse.Name!]Get a Corpse
step.text: Collect a corpse from one of the creatures.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.What's Eating the Watervine?.step.Return with the Corpse.Name!]Return with the Corpse
step.text: Return to Joppa with the corpse of the watervine vermin.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.Raising Indrix.Name!]Raising Indrix
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.Raising Indrix.Hagiograph!]O grace! =name= recovered a shard of black glass from a teeming jungle and returned it to the mechanical goat whose circuitry it powers.
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.Raising Indrix.Gospel!]While wandering in the jungle near Kyakukya, =name= dreamed =player.subjective= orbited a darkling star and in its vast accretion disk piled the building blocks of self. From then on, =name= kept a starless, triangular prism on =player.possessive= person.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Raising Indrix.step.Find Mamon Souldrinker.Name!]Find Mamon Souldrinker
step.text: Travel to the goatfolk village and find Mamon Souldrinker.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Raising Indrix.step.Recover the Amaranthine Prism.Name!]Recover the Amaranthine Prism
step.text: Return the amaranthine prism to Warden Indrix.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.Fetch Argyve a Knickknack.Name!]Fetch Argyve a Knickknack
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.Fetch Argyve a Knickknack.Accomplishment!]You fetched a trinket for an old man.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.Fetch Argyve a Knickknack.Hagiograph!]Inside a temple of water and vine, =name= taught an old man the value of chrome.
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.Fetch Argyve a Knickknack.Gospel!]<spice.elements.entity@elements[random].weddingConditions.!random.capitalize>, =name= cemented =player.possessive= friendship with the Tinkers' Guild by marrying Argyve.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Fetch Argyve a Knickknack.step.Find a Knickknack.Name!]Find a Knickknack
step.text: Search the regions surrounding Joppa for an artifact.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Fetch Argyve a Knickknack.step.Return to Argyve.Name!]Return to Argyve
step.text: Bring the artifact to Argyve.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.Fetch Argyve Another Knickknack.Name!]Fetch Argyve Another Knickknack
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.Fetch Argyve Another Knickknack.Accomplishment!]You fetched another trinket for an old man.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.Fetch Argyve Another Knickknack.Hagiograph!]In the shadow of steel beneath the High Salt Sun, =name= taught an old man the value of chrome.
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.Fetch Argyve Another Knickknack.Gospel!]<spice.elements.entity@elements[random].weddingConditions.!random.capitalize>, =name= cemented =player.possessive= friendship with the Tinkers' Guild by marrying Argyve for a second time.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Fetch Argyve Another Knickknack.step.Find Another Knickknack.Name!]Find Another Knickknack
step.text: Search the regions surrounding Joppa for another artifact.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Fetch Argyve Another Knickknack.step.Return to Argyve.Name!]Return to Argyve
step.text: Return to Argyve with the artifact.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.Weirdwire Conduit... Eureka!.Name!]Weirdwire Conduit... Eureka!
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.Weirdwire Conduit... Eureka!.Accomplishment!]With your help, Argyve detected a strange signal.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.Weirdwire Conduit... Eureka!.Hagiograph!]By the auspices of the marsh, =name= invented the Weirdwire Conduit and detected a hidden signal.
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.Weirdwire Conduit... Eureka!.Gospel!]At a remote workshop near the oasis-hamlet of Joppa, =name= and =player.possessive= apprentice Argyve invented an apparatus that evoked the presence of pounding drums and blistering wire. They named it the Weirdwire Conduit.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Weirdwire Conduit... Eureka!.step.Find 200 Feet of Wire.Name!]Find 200 Feet of Wire
step.text: Search the rust wells, east of Joppa, for 200 feet of wire.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Weirdwire Conduit... Eureka!.step.Return to Argyve.Name!]Return to Argyve
step.text: Deliver the wire to Argyve.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.A Canticle for Barathrum.Name!]A Canticle for Barathrum
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.A Canticle for Barathrum.Accomplishment!]You spoke with the Barathrumites at their enclave in Grit Gate.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.A Canticle for Barathrum.Hagiograph!]=name= penned and sang a canticle for the irenic quillbears who live beneath the earth.
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.A Canticle for Barathrum.Gospel!]While roaming the westwise jungle, =name= came upon a clan of urshiib performing a secret ritual. Because of =player.t's= disk-like eyes, they accepted =name= into their fold and taught =player.objective= their secrets.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.A Canticle for Barathrum.step.Travel to Grit Gate.Name!]Travel to Grit Gate
step.text: Travel to the ruined, subterranean gate northeast of Joppa.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.A Canticle for Barathrum.step.Locate the Barathrumite Enclave.Name!]Locate the Barathrumite Enclave
step.text: Locate the Barathrumite enclave within Grit Gate

step.Name: [!quests.quest.A Canticle for Barathrum.step.Speak with the Barathrumites.Name!]Speak with the Barathrumites
step.text: Ask the Barathrumites about Argyve's strange signal.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.A Signal in the Noise.Name!]A Signal in the Noise
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.A Signal in the Noise.Accomplishment!]You spoke with the Barathrumites at their enclave in Grit Gate.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.A Signal in the Noise.Hagiograph!]=name= penned and sang a canticle for the irenic quillbears who live beneath the earth.
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.A Signal in the Noise.Gospel!]While roaming the westwise jungle, =name= came upon a clan of urshiib performing a secret ritual. Because of =player.t's= disk-like eyes, they accepted =name= into their fold and taught =player.objective= their secrets.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.A Signal in the Noise.step.Travel to Grit Gate.Name!]Travel to Grit Gate
step.text: Travel to the ruined, subterranean gate in the western jungle.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.A Signal in the Noise.step.Locate the Barathrumite Enclave.Name!]Locate the Barathrumite Enclave
step.text: Locate the Barathrumite enclave within Grit Gate

step.Name: [!quests.quest.A Signal in the Noise.step.Speak with the Barathrumites.Name!]Speak with the Barathrumites
step.text: Ask the Barathrumites about the strange signal.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.More Than a Willing Spirit.Name!]More Than a Willing Spirit
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.More Than a Willing Spirit.Accomplishment!]You braved Golgotha and displayed your prowess to the Barathrumites.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.More Than a Willing Spirit.Hagiograph!]In the month of =month= of =year=, =name= emerged from the trash chutes of Golgotha, victorious and bathed in slime.
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.More Than a Willing Spirit.Gospel!]While roaming the westwise jungle, =name= came upon a clan of urshiib performing a secret ritual. Because of =player.t's= coating of foul slime, they accepted =name= into their fold and taught =player.objective= their secrets.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.More Than a Willing Spirit.step.Travel to Golgotha.Name!]Travel to Golgotha
step.text: Travel to the great cave Golgotha north of Grit Gate.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.More Than a Willing Spirit.step.Find a Dysfunctional Waydroid.Name!]Find a Dysfunctional Waydroid
step.text: Find a dysfunctional waydroid among the ruins of Golgotha.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.More Than a Willing Spirit.step.Repair the Waydroid.Name!]Repair the Waydroid
step.text: Repair the waydroid.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.More Than a Willing Spirit.step.Return to Grit Gate.Name!]Return to Grit Gate
step.text: Return to Grit Gate with the waydroid and speak with the Barathrumites.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.Decoding the Signal.Name!]Decoding the Signal
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.Decoding the Signal.Accomplishment!]You spoke with the baetyl at the Temple of the Rock and decoded the mysterious signal.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.Decoding the Signal.Hagiograph!]Bravery! =name= plunged into the mouth of an open ice shelf and conversed with a baetyl in the sacred tongue.
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.Decoding the Signal.Gospel!]Inside a giant block of ice, =name= cemented =player.possessive= friendship with the Mechanimists by exchanging whispered vows with a sparking baetyl.

step.ID: Get Q Girl's Instructions onto the Data Disk
step.Name: [!quests.quest.Decoding the Signal.step.Get Q Girl's Instructions onto the Data Disk.Name!]Get Q Girl's Instructions onto the Data Disk
step.text: Speak to Q Girl in the workshop and ask her to encode her instructions for the baetyl onto the disk.

step.ID: Locate the Mechanimist Compound at Bethesda Susa
step.Name: [!quests.quest.Decoding the Signal.step.Locate the Mechanimist Compound at Bethesda Susa.Name!]Locate the Mechanimist Compound at Bethesda Susa
step.text: Travel north to the great cavern Bethesda Susa and locate the Mechanimist temple.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Decoding the Signal.step.Decode the Signal.Name!]Decode the Signal
step.text: Infiltrate the Mechanimist compound, engage the baetyl, and decode the signal.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Decoding the Signal.step.Return to Grit Gate.Name!]Return to Grit Gate
step.text: Return to Grit Gate and speak with Otho.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.O Glorious Shekhinah!.Name!]O Glorious Shekhinah!
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.O Glorious Shekhinah!.Accomplishment!]On the recommendation of a proselyte, you visited the merchant bazaar and grand cathedral at the Six Day Stilt.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.O Glorious Shekhinah!.Hagiograph!]=name= trekked through the salt pans, north and west, to the merchant bazaar and grand cathedral of the Six Day Stilt. There, the stiltfolk sang hymns in the sultan's honor.
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.O Glorious Shekhinah!.Gospel!]After trekking the vacant flats, =name= journeyed to the merchant bazaar and cathedral at the Six Day Stilt. There =player.subjective= befriended the Mechanimists and threw an artifact down the Sacred Well.

step.ID: Make a Pilgrimage to the Six Day Stilt
step.Name: [!quests.quest.O Glorious Shekhinah!.step.Make a Pilgrimage to the Six Day Stilt.Name!]Make a Pilgrimage to the Six Day Stilt
step.text: Journey through the Great Salt Desert to visit the merchant bazaar and Mechanimist cathedral, where a proselyte asked you to make an offering of a trinket.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.The Earl of Omonporch.Name!]The Earl of Omonporch
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.The Earl of Omonporch.Accomplishment!]You dealt with Asphodel and secured the grounds at the base of the Spindle.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.The Earl of Omonporch.Hagiograph!]In the month of =month= of =year=, =name= appointed Asphodel the Lovely earl of Omonporch and Protector of the Spindle Gjaus.
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.The Earl of Omonporch.Gospel!]In =year=, =name= appointed the corrupt administrator Asphodel as earl and minister of Omonporch. There xe mandated the practice of <spice.elements.entity@elements[random].practices.!random> in =player.t's= name.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.The Earl of Omonporch.step.Travel to Omonporch.Name!]Travel to Omonporch
step.text: Travel north to the Spindle at Omonporch.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.The Earl of Omonporch.step.Secure the Spindle.Name!]Secure the Spindle
step.text: Take control of the grounds beneath the Spindle.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.The Earl of Omonporch.step.Return to Grit Gate.Name!]Return to Grit Gate
step.text: Return to Grit Gate to report your success.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Grave Thoughts.step.Investigate the Rumbling.Name!]Investigate the Rumbling
step.text: Access the mainframe and scan the shale surrounding the enclave.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Grave Thoughts.step.Speak to Otho.Name!]Speak to Otho
step.text: Speak to Otho to via the mainframe room intercom or in person.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.A Call to Arms.Name!]A Call to Arms
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.A Call to Arms.Accomplishment!]You valiantly defended Grit Gate from an attack by the Putus Templar.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.A Call to Arms.Hagiograph!]=name= smashed a battalion of Sons and Daughters through a giant mainframe, showering the surrounding temple in glass and gallium.
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.A Call to Arms.Gospel!]In the month of =month= of =year=, =name= won a decisive victory against the combined Templar forces at the bloody Battle of Grit Gate. Grit Gate was so devasted by hot gallium and smashed glass that it was renamed Otho's Graveyard.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.A Call to Arms.step.Prepare Defenses.Name!]Prepare Defenses
step.text: Power laser emplacements, power force projectors, overclock chromelings, and activate Rodanis Y in preparation for the Putus Templar attack.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.A Call to Arms.step.Defend Grit Gate.Name!]Defend Grit Gate
step.text: Defend Grit Gate from its assailants.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.The Assessment.step.Speak to Otho.Name!]Speak to Otho
step.text: Speak to Otho to assess the losses suffered in the attack.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.Pax Klanq, I Presume?.Name!]Pax Klanq, I Presume?
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.Pax Klanq, I Presume?.Accomplishment!]You walked the Coral Path and convinced Pax Klanq, mushroom prodigy, to fabricate a battery of Q Girl's design.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.Pax Klanq, I Presume?.Hagiograph!]In the void of space, =name= the Mason constructed a Coral Path out of starbrick and conversed with a mushroom in the sacred tongue.
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.Pax Klanq, I Presume?.Gospel!]In an extradimensional cathedral made of coral and fungus flesh, =name= cemented =player.possessive= relationship with fungi by marrying Pax Klanq.

step.ID: Get Q Girl's Blueprints for the Climber
step.Name: [!quests.quest.Pax Klanq, I Presume?.step.Get Q Girl's Blueprints for the Climber.Name!]Get Q Girl's Blueprints for the Climber
step.text: Get the blueprints for the climber to deliver to Pax Klanq.

step.ID: Seek the Heart of the Rainbow
step.Name: [!quests.quest.Pax Klanq, I Presume?.step.Seek the Heart of the Rainbow.Name!]Seek the Heart of the Rainbow
step.text: Decipher the first part of the enigma.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Pax Klanq, I Presume?.step.Eat the God's Flesh.Name!]Eat the God's Flesh
step.text: Decipher the second part of the enigma.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Pax Klanq, I Presume?.step.Follow the Coral Path.Name!]Follow the Coral Path
step.text: Decipher the third part of the enigma.

step.ID: Convince Pax Klanq to Construct the Climber
step.Name: [!quests.quest.Pax Klanq, I Presume?.step.Convince Pax Klanq to Construct the Climber.Name!]Convince Pax Klanq to Construct the Climber
step.text: Get Pax Klanq to agree to fabricate the climber from Q Girl's design.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Pax Klanq, I Presume?.step.Return to Grit Gate.Name!]Return to Grit Gate
step.text: Return to Grit Gate and speak to Barathrum.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.Petals on the Wind.Name!]Petals on the Wind
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.Petals on the Wind.Accomplishment!]At the behest of a hindren pariah, you traveled to the hidden village of Bey Lah to investigate a mystery.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.Petals on the Wind.Hagiograph!]Benevolent =name= agreed to meddle in the affairs of the meadow at the behest of a deerfolk pariah. The sultan reigns with kindheartedness!
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.Petals on the Wind.Gospel!]At <spice.time.partsOfDay.!random> under a <spice.commonPhrases.strange.!random.article> and meadowed sky, the hindren of Bey Lah saw an image on the horizon that looked like a great looking glass. It was =name=, and once =player.subjective= arrived, the hindren built a monument to =player.objective= and thenceforth called =player.objective= the Looking Glass Kendren.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Petals on the Wind.step.Investigate Bey Lah.Name!]Investigate Bey Lah
step.text: Travel to the hidden village of Bey Lah and investigate the problems there.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.Find Eskhind.Name!]Find Eskhind
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.Find Eskhind.Accomplishment!]You found the hindren pariah Eskhind and her sisters inside a hollowed out tree.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.Find Eskhind.Hagiograph!]Remember! =name= admonished the pariah Eskhind for fleeing her destiny. Thenceforth she was known as Eskhind the Meek.
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.Find Eskhind.Gospel!]In the month of =month= of =year=, =name= was challenged by the accused Eskhind to a duel over the location of the hindren heirloom Kindrish. =name= won and admonished Eskhind into returning to Bey Lah.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Find Eskhind.step.Find Eskhind.Name!]Find Eskhind
step.text: Find Eskhind and retrieve Kindrish.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Find Eskhind.step.Speak to Warden Neelahind.Name!]Speak to Warden Neelahind
step.text: Speak to Warden Neelahind, who was close friends with Eskhind.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Find Eskhind.step.Deliver News of Eskhind.Name!]Deliver News of Eskhind
step.text: Speak to Keh with news of Eskhind.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.Love and Fear.Name!]Love and Fear
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.Love and Fear.Accomplishment!]You found and returned a discarded love poem.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.Love and Fear.Hagiograph!]How inspiring is the presence of =name=, who so redeemed Eskhind the Meek that she sought the hand of Bey Lah's greatest champion!
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.Love and Fear.Gospel!]In the burnt out core of a tree stump, =name= cemented =player.possessive= friendship with the hindren of Bey Lah by marrying Eskhind and the Warden Neelahind.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Love and Fear.step.Rescue an Imperiled Love.Name!]Rescue an Imperiled Love
step.text: Intervene before the fate of the lovers is sealed.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Love and Fear.step.Return the Love Sonnet.Name!]Return the Love Sonnet
step.text: Give the crumpled sheet of paper to its author or intended recipient.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.Kith and Kin.Name!]Kith and Kin
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.Kith and Kin.Accomplishment!]For better or worse to the fate of Bey Lah, you solved the mystery of Kindrish's disappearance and helped Warden Neelahind administer justice.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.Kith and Kin.Hagiograph!]Hallowed savior! =name= brought peace and prosperity to the troubled deerfolk of the Bey Lah meadow.
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.Kith and Kin.Gospel!]Acting against thieves and the authorities who empower them, =name= led an investigation in the village of Bey Lah. Because of =player.t's= <spice.elements.entity@elements[random].adjectives.!random> wit, the Warden Neelahind was able to properly administer justice.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Kith and Kin.step.Brief Warden Neelahind.Name!]Brief Warden Neelahind
step.text: Tell Bey Lah's Warden about the disputed nature of Kindrish's theft.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Kith and Kin.step.Discover all the evidence.Name!]Discover all the evidence
step.text: Discover all evidence that might lead to the thief.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Kith and Kin.step.Accuse the thief.Name!]Accuse the thief
step.text: Speak to Warden Neelahind with evidence of the event and accuse the thief that took Kindrish.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.The Buried Watchers.Name!]The Buried Watchers
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.The Buried Watchers.Accomplishment!]You visited a coterie of Tomb-dwelling mopango.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.The Buried Watchers.Hagiograph!]Deep in the Tomb of the Eaters at Omonporch, =name= stumbled upon a clan of mopango performing a secret ritual. Ey accepted the sultan into eir fold and taught =player.objective= eir secrets.
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.The Buried Watchers.Gospel!]Deep in the Tomb of the Eaters at Omonporch, =name= stumbled upon a clan of mopango performing a secret ritual. Ey accepted the =sultanTerm= into eir fold and taught =player.objective= eir secrets.

step.ID: Visit the Mopango Settlement in the Tomb of the Eaters
step.Name: [!quests.quest.The Buried Watchers.step.Visit the Mopango Settlement in the Tomb of the Eaters.Name!]Visit the Mopango Settlement in the Tomb of the Eaters
step.text: Find Vivira, a friendly turret in the Northwest catacombs, and tell em that Zothom sent you.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Fraying Favorites.step.Talk to Lebah.Name!]Talk to Lebah
step.text: Ask Lebah about eir encounter with the repulsive device.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Fraying Favorites.step.Recover the Repulsive Device.Name!]Recover the Repulsive Device
step.text: Locate k-Goninon in the Folk Catacombs and recover the repulsive device.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Fraying Favorites.step.Speak with the Watchers.Name!]Speak with the Watchers
step.text: Ask the mopango watchers Dadogom, Doyoba, Gyamyo, and Yona about the repulsive device.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Fraying Favorites.step.Use the Repulsive Device.Name!]Use the Repulsive Device
step.text: Choose how to best apply the repulsive device.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.Tomb of the Eaters.Name!]Tomb of the Eaters
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.Tomb of the Eaters.Accomplishment!]You returned from the Tomb of the Eaters after successfully disabling the Spindle's magnetic field.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Tomb of the Eaters.step.Recover the Mark of Death.Name!]Recover the Mark of Death
step.text: Recover the lost sigil used by the Eaters to mark their dead.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Tomb of the Eaters.step.Inscribe the Mark.Name!]Inscribe the Mark
step.text: Tattoo the mark on your body.

step.ID: Enter the Tomb of the Eaters
step.Name: [!quests.quest.Tomb of the Eaters.step.Enter the Tomb of the Eaters.Name!]Enter the Tomb of the Eaters
step.text: Gain entrance to the sealed Tomb.

step.ID: Ascend the Tomb and Cross into Brightsheol
step.Name: [!quests.quest.Tomb of the Eaters.step.Ascend the Tomb and Cross into Brightsheol.Name!]Ascend the Tomb and Cross into Brightsheol
step.text: Ascend the Tomb and find Resheph's burial chamber. From there, discover a way to travel to Brightsheol.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Tomb of the Eaters.step.Disable the Spindle's Magnetic Field.Name!]Disable the Spindle's Magnetic Field
step.text: Access the Spindle's control unit and turn off the field.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Tomb of the Eaters.step.Return to Grit Gate.Name!]Return to Grit Gate
step.text: Return to Grit Gate and speak to Barathrum.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Landing Pads.step.Consult Settlements.Name!]Consult Settlements
step.text: Convince the leaders of at least three settlements to provide sanctuary for the slynth.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Landing Pads.step.Sanctuary Candidates.Name!]Sanctuary Candidates
step.text: These factions have agreed to host the slynth.

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Landing Pads.step.Bid the Slynth to Choose.Name!]Bid the Slynth to Choose
step.text: Tell Thah to convene the slynth and make a decision.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.Return to the Hydropon.Name!]Return to the Hydropon

step.Name: [!quests.quest.Return to the Hydropon.step.Return to the Hydropon.Name!]Return to the Hydropon
step.text: Once the slynth have arrived at their new home, speak to Thah at the hydropon.

quest.Name: [!quests.quest.If, Then, Else.Name!]If, Then, Else
quest.Accomplishment: [!quests.quest.If, Then, Else.Accomplishment!]You helped Chavvah, the Tree of Life, complete the ritual of -elseing and sever one of its entity-chimes forever.
quest.Hagiograph: [!quests.quest.If, Then, Else.Hagiograph!]Beauty in subtraction! Pruner =name= cut the Tree of Life to a more aesthetic form.
quest.Gospel: [!quests.quest.If, Then, Else.Gospel!]Acting in accordance with the Tree of Life's many wills, =name= brought a transit rock to the glowing Soft beneath Chavvah's trunk. There =player.subjective= performed a secret ritual and returned to the surface forever altered.
